body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Lovelace Motors customer support. My name is Kyle Martinez. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Kyle, my name is Patricia Flores.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Patricia. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I recently purchased a vehicle from your dealership and I have concerns about the product quality.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear about that, Patricia. Could you please provide me with the Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) of your car?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, the VIN number is one two three four five, six seven eight, nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Could you also provide me with the date of purchase in the format month, day, year?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I purchased the car on zero four, two zero two two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Patricia. We will look into your concerns and get back to you shortly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Patricia. Have a great day.
